title: SuperBike
description: A MERN stack niche bicycle website.Implement Firebase authentication specially Email/Password and Google Sign in method.Here, this app's main focus is to implement user dashboard and admin dashboard.

title: GoTravel
description: A MERN stack travel agency website.Responsive MERN Stack app and Implement Admin Management Page. Implement Authentication System with Firebase.Face a challenge to improve the Admin Management page and at last solve this after 1days of practice.

title: Life Care Clinic
description: A simple react life care clinic website.Here, Implement two authentication symtem, Google Sign in and Email-Password system.Implement Context API, React Hooks, custom hooks.Here, use React Route v5 and implement Private Route.
